message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a novel nonlinear solution for metric learning and applies it to boost the performance of kNN and SVM classifiers. This work involves machine learning, computer vision, and artificial intelligence, which are covered by the sub-categories cs.LG, cs.CV, and cs.AI. The use of thin-plate splines (TPS) as the geometric model also suggests a possible connection to neural networks, which are covered by cs.NE. Finally, the paper involves classification tasks, which are covered by cs.CL.
